page.title: 15Transport: A43(T) Kettering
page.content: The A43 trunk road links Northampton and Oxford to the south-west of Kettering with Stamford and Boston to the north-east. Called Stamford Road this separates Avondale and Grange estates. Recently a man was killed crossing this tree lined road. Perhaps the traffic is too fast! It is certainly heavy throughout the day in both directions. In a half hour period on a fine July day a survey showed:- To Kettering: 100 cars,22 vans, 35 lorries,8 cycles,6 m/cycles,2 buses, Out of Kettering: 135 cars, 26 lorries,26 vans,4 cycles,10 m/cycles, 1 bus and 3 caravans. From a point just north of Weekley a new by-pass road is envisaged to join up with the proposed A1-M1 Link Road. If this is built the volume of traffic through the town could be much reduced.
